## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                      | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `mode`   | `mode`    |                                                                  | `string` | `'light'`   |
| `name`   | `name`    | Set the brand name that will set the theme styling for the page. | `string` | `undefined` |
